text: @ColbyItkowitz @DevinCow Paying attention to Coronavirus? Here are my thoughts...Increase Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) intake & Don't use alcohol based hand sanitizers, use https://t.co/EEfUi7Ddd0 & Seriously prepare for 30/60 days with supplies/food & Avoid indoor packed places & Take your temp daily
